cards.title: Unmute
setup: At the start of the game, {Unmute} enters play 'Anti-Supers Iconoclast' side up.
Reveal cards from the villain deck until Video Drone Swarm and one nemesis are revealed and put both into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if {Unmute} has 0 or fewer HP, destroy each other villain card then flip her. For each card destroyed this way, {Unmute} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} lightning damage.
At the end of the villain turn, {Unmute} deals the {H - 2} hero targets with the highest HP 3 melee damage each.
cards.advanced: At the start of the game, put both Nemesis cards into play.
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, restore {Unmute} to 30 HP then remove all non-Amp cards from the villain trash and deck from the game. Shuffle the villain trash into its deck.
Whenever a villain card would be put into the trash, instead put it under this card.
Increase damage dealt by {Unmute} by 1 for each card under this card.

At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck. Then, if there are no cards in the villain deck, {Unmute}'s cybernetics have overcharged and destroyed the area. [b]Game over.[/b]
cards.flippedAdvanced: When flipped to this side, search the villain deck and trash for both copies of Vicious Call Out and Shattering Cry and remove them from the game.
cards.challengeText: Before {Unmute} flips to her second side, search her deck and trash for all Amp cards other than Echo Chamber and put them under her character card.

cards.title: A Gift from Our Sponsors
body: {Unmute} and each villain device regains {H} HP.
Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a device is revealed and put it into play, then discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: The latest from Tyran's{BR}[b]HTT department[/b]. Should work with your existing tech with only [b]minor[/b] side effects.

cards.title: Devastating Harmonics
body: {Unmute} deals the two hero targets with the highest hp {H} sonic damage each.
Until the end of the next villain turn, increase damage dealt to targets dealt damage this way by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Ugh, this noise is{BR}[b]scrambling[/b] my brain.

cards.title: 'Don't Forget About Ego Trip!'
body: If [i]Ego Trip[/i] is in play, restore him to full HP, then each hero target deals him 1 melee damage.
Otherwise, search the villain deck and trash for [i]Ego Trip[/i] and put him into play. If you searched the villain deck, shuffle it.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey losers!{BR}I heard you were trying to have{BR}fun without me? [b]Too bad![/b]

cards.title: Echo Chamber
body: {Unmute} deals each other target 2 sonic damage.
Whenever a target is destroyed this way, {Unmute} deals the hero target with the highest hp 2 sonic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: That is a very unladylike noise.

cards.title: Ego Trip
body: The maximum HP of this card is {H * 3}.
The first time {Unmute} would be dealt damage each turn, redirect it to this card.
The first time this card is dealt damage by each other target each turn, it deals the source of that damage 3 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Chuckie Lovhoug. He's got none{BR}of the usual markers for gene therapy, so the magic crew coming in to look at him.

cards.title: Fractal
body: The maximum HP of this card is {H * 2}.
Reduce damage dealt to {Fractal} to 1.

At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the {H - 2} hero targets with the lowest hp 1 irreducible radiant damage each. Until the start of the next villain turn, reduce damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Roxy Barrett, Becky's BFF.{BR}Powers started out as tech, but they have started to physically change her.

cards.title: 'I Know Your Tricks!'
body: When a hero target would deal a villain target 3 or more damage at once, prevent that damage and {Unmute} deals the source of that damage {H - 1} melee damage.
Then destroy this card.

cards.title: Overclocked Cybernetics
body: At the start of the villain turn, {Unmute} deals each non-villain target 4 sonic damage. Then destroy this card.
Each hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] {Unmute} deals this hero {H + 1} lightning damage. Destroy Overclocked Cybernetics.

flavorQuotes.text: Dangerous? As if.{BR}This is just the sort of [b]power[/b] I need.

cards.title: Piercing the Conspiracy
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Damage dealt to hero targets is irreducible.

flavorQuotes.text: First there are mysterious [b]vampire-ish[/b]{BR}slayings and then the Guardians get a new [b]vampire[/b] member? [b]Connect the dots[/b]!

cards.title: Rabid Fans
body: Reduce damage dealt to other villain targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: We are here because Becky has{BR}been [b]wrongly[/b] imprisoned and [b]denied[/b] the support she needs for her disabilities.

cards.title: Shattering Cry
body: Each player destroys one of their equipment or ongoing cards.
{Unmute} deals each hero target from a deck that did not destroy a card this way 3 sonic damage.

cards.title: Sound and Vision
body: If {Fractal} is in play, the next time {Unmute} deals a hero target damage, {Fractal} deals that same target that same amount of radiant damage and each villain target regains {H - 2} HP.
Otherwise, search the villain deck and trash for {Fractal} and put her into play. If you searched the villain deck, shuffle it.

flavorQuotes.text: Ugh, [b]Of course[/b] the fanboys{BR}made up a ship name for Becky and Roxy...

cards.title: Tyran Corp Upgrades
body: At the end of the villain turn, if there is a card under this card, put it into play. Otherwise, put the top most Amp card in the villain trash into play.
After a card has been played this way, move it under this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Becky Strong. Has had a lot of{BR}cybernetic work done to her body, and not the kind some newbie super genius makes.

cards.title: Vicious Call Out
body: {Unmute} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} sonic damage.
That target's player may discard two cards. If two cards are not discarded this way, {Unmute} deals that same hero target {H} psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: So-called superheroes who fight{BR}the downtrodden and disenfranchised. Not for justice, but fleeting fame and glory.

cards.title: Video Drone Swarm
body: Play this card next to the hero with the highest HP.
Whenever the hero next to this card uses a power, they deal themselves 2 irreducible psychic damage.
At the end of that hero's turn, move this card next to the hero with the highest HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Let's see what the public thinks{BR}about you after they see your actions in full HD detail.
